title: Speech-to-Text Web Application
description: Converts live speech to text, with deep learning model improvements for accuracy. Built with Flask and the WebSpeech API.

title: Plate Vision: ALPR
description: An end-to-end detection pipeline for license plates using YOLOv5 for object detection and a custom CNN for optical character recognition.

title: AI-Based M-Sand Quality Monitoring
description: Classifies M-Sand quality from images using a custom CNN model. Features a React frontend and a Flask backend.
